scripts.test:merge: rm -rf blob-merged && mkdir -p blob-merged && for dir in blob-report/*/; do name=$(basename "$dir"); for f in "$dir"*.zip; do cp "$f" "blob-merged/${name}-$(basename "$f")"; done; done && playwright merge-reports blob-merged --reporter=line,html && echo 'Report available at playwright-report/index.html'
scripts.docker:up:all: docker-compose -f docker/docker-compose.wp-6.7.yml up -d && docker-compose -f docker/docker-compose.wp-6.8.yml up -d && docker-compose -f docker/docker-compose.wp-6.9.yml up -d
scripts.docker:down:all: docker-compose -f docker/docker-compose.wp-6.7.yml down && docker-compose -f docker/docker-compose.wp-6.8.yml down && docker-compose -f docker/docker-compose.wp-6.9.yml down
scripts.docker:setup:all: docker-compose -f docker/docker-compose.wp-6.7.yml exec -T wordpress /setup.sh && docker-compose -f docker/docker-compose.wp-6.8.yml exec -T wordpress /setup.sh && docker-compose -f docker/docker-compose.wp-6.9.yml exec -T wordpress /setup.sh
